titleStmt.title: An account of the bold & daring enterprize of the Primitive Reformed in order to recover their just rights, liberties, and profession of their religion in the dutchy of Savoy. In a letter written from Lawzanne in Swisserland, to a person of honour, August 30. 1689. Licensed, September 3d, 1689. J.F.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Robert Clavel, at the Peacock near the west-end of St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Primitive Reformed = Waldenses. Narrates the first part of the return of the Waldenses to their own country.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the Peacock near the west-end of St. Paul's Church-yard
